label: Hero
description: A protagonist who accepts responsibility for others and the outcome of their world. Often paired with courage or discipline, yet vulnerable to fatal flaws like hubris. Reputation may be heroic while a destabilizing secret tests whether self‑interest or the greater good wins.

label: Antihero
description: A central figure whose methods or ethics are compromised but whose goals still matter. Generates strong internal conflict (duty vs. desire) and usually carries a painful backstory; destiny skews bittersweet and reputation swings between infamous and indispensable.

label: Mentor
description: A guide whose wisdom accelerates a protagonist’s growth. Their authority stems from occupation (scholar, veteran, mystic); a hidden failing or past error can pivot mid‑plot and force the pupil to stand alone.

label: Trickster
description: A disruptor who breaks rules and exposes hypocrisy. Positive wit clashes with impulsiveness; secrets are weapons. Destiny tends toward irony as reputation toggles between clown and genius.

label: Caregiver
description: A protector who prioritizes others’ well‑being. Motivated by love or duty; common fatal flaws include self‑neglect or martyrdom. Occupations like healer or teacher provide practical stakes under external pressure.

label: Ruler
description: A power‑holder balancing stability and justice. Driven by legacy or control, with pride as a classic flaw. Reputation becomes political currency while succession secrets and coups reshape destiny.

label: Rebel
description: Challenges norms and oppression. Motivations of freedom or justice align with external conflicts against authority; bravery collides with recklessness and destiny arcs from reluctant leader to tragic martyr.

label: Sage
description: Seeker of knowledge and meaning. Occupations (scholar, oracle) tie to curiosity; flaws include detachment or arrogance. Forbidden knowledge as a secret can raise catastrophic stakes and force action.

label: Innocent
description: Defined by purity, hope, or naïveté. Trust and optimism invite empathy while gullibility creates danger. Destiny often explores coming‑of‑age as reputation shifts from sheltered to symbol.

label: Explorer
description: Driven to cross boundaries—geographic, social, or intellectual. Discovery and freedom clash with external constraints; resourcefulness offsets restlessness. Backstories often feature confining origins.

label: Everyman
description: An ordinary person thrust into extraordinary stakes. Relatable strengths like resilience fight self‑doubt. Reputation begins low and transforms as common virtue meets uncommon pressure.

label: Lover
description: Seeks connection and union. Devotion collides with duty or ambition; fatal flaws include jealousy or idealization. Secrets like forbidden love can dominate social stakes and reputation.

label: Creator
description: An innovator who brings new things into being. Motivation for legacy or expression meets external resistance (patronage, censorship). Flaws like perfectionism risk sacrificing relationships.

label: Magician
description: A transformer who bends reality or systems. Motivated by mastery or healing but prone to control and hubris. Taboo rites as secrets and heretic/savior reputations shape rise or fall.

label: Jester
description: A truth‑teller cloaked in humor. Levity and social intelligence can mask fear or avoidance. Destiny hinges on whether laughter disarms tyranny or trivializes danger.

label: Warrior
description: Solves problems through force and discipline. Honor or protection motivates; rigidity or anger creates internal battles. Destiny questions what is worth fighting for.

label: Healer
description: Restores bodies, minds, or systems. Mercy clashes with scarcity or corruption; flaws include savior complex or burnout. Illicit methods as secrets test reputation and ethics.

label: Guardian
description: A sentinel bound to a person, place, or vow. Duty competes with desire; sacrifice haunts destiny. External conflict places them at choke points; loyalty defines internal struggle.

label: Outlaw
description: A lawbreaker by necessity or conviction. Seeks freedom or survival while opposing institutions; infamous reputation may hide a code. Cynicism tempts tragic outcomes.

label: Detective
description: A pattern‑breaker who solves mysteries. Pursues truth and justice under pressure from secrecy and corruption. Obsession strains relationships; credibility binds occupation and reputation.

label: Scholar
description: A theorist whose weapon is understanding. Curiosity conflicts with action; paralysis by analysis is a risk. Lost texts and hidden data turn knowledge into plot‑level stakes.

label: Artist
description: A shaper of culture and emotion. Expression collides with patronage and poverty; volatility or narcissism may sabotage ties. Reputation swings can make or break careers.

label: Priest/Cleric
description: Mediator between people and the sacred. Service and order meet politics and heresy; fanaticism or hypocrisy are explosive flaws. Institutional secrets can topple regimes.

label: Merchant
description: Broker of value and networks. Wealth or influence motivate; avarice erodes trust. Reputation and secret deals define external stakes in markets and courts alike.

label: Leader
description: Coordinates people and strategy without sovereign title. Seeks impact but may over‑control; destiny tests whether they build community or cult.

label: Strategist
description: Wins through foresight and systems thinking. Craves elegant solutions; coldness strains relationships. Misreading secrets or reputations collapses intricate plans.

label: Diplomat
description: Bridge‑builder across factions. Pursues peace or leverage in negotiation arenas; appeasement can backfire and secrets ruin credibility.

label: Spy
description: Lives in ambiguity to gather secrets. Motivation (cause or survival) entangles with identity; duplicity fatigue is common and destiny forces a choice between truth and self.

label: Assassin
description: Professional killer with a code or cause. Justice or coin collides with conscience; desensitization or remorse drives internal collapse. Reputation is precise, fearsome, isolating.

label: Thief
description: Infiltrator who redistributes or hoards. Liberation, thrill, or need clash with law and trust. Greed and compulsion are common risks; true loyalties stay hidden.

label: Ranger/Tracker
description: Solitary scout between wild and civilized. Stewardship and freedom meet threats from nature and encroachment; isolation limits bonds and destiny weighs wilderness vs. belonging.

label: Judge
description: Arbiter of law and fairness. Justice collides with politics; rigidity or bias complicate verdicts. Tainted secrets delegitimize entire systems.

label: Visionary
description: Future‑oriented catalyst who sees possibilities. Transformation fights inertia; grandiosity risks collapse. Fate measures whether vision becomes movement or madness.

label: Engineer/Tinkerer
description: Builds mechanisms and processes to solve problems. Efficiency and curiosity meet resource limits; tunnel vision risks harm. Dangerous prototypes make secrets volatile.

label: Pirate
description: Raider outside legal orders. Plunder, freedom, or revenge fuel conflict with navies and merchants; mutiny shadows destiny and a fearsome reputation both attracts and imperils crews.

label: Nomad
description: Mover who resists roots. Freedom or survival confronts pressures to settle; restlessness sabotages ties. Destiny asks whether home is a place or a path.

label: Prophet/Seer
description: Bearer of visions or warnings. Truth meets disbelief; certainty alienates allies. Misread omens as secrets can doom many.

label: Alchemist
description: Seeks transformation through experiment and synthesis. Perfection edges toward obsession; forbidden methods escalate peril. Destiny balances discovery against cost.

label: Bard
description: Storyteller whose voice shapes memory and morale. Legacy or influence meets censorship; embellishment erodes trust. Reputation is currency on every road.

label: Witch/Warlock
description: Liminal practitioner bound to hidden powers. Power or protection collides with fear and persecution; bargains and corruption threaten existentially while secrecy defines survival.
